replies.author: 孟婆汤没了
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:iron_boots 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.1,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:knockbackResistance,Slot:feet}]}复制代码
用这个指令就可以了
